entry.title: Biggest Video Games Releasing in February 2024
entry.summary: Final Fantasy VII Rebirth and Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League headline a busier month for major gaming debuts.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin and Ethereum Dip, Bitcoin Recovers
entry.summary: On Monday, several digital assets saw a precipitous drop. Most worked their way back to flat.

entry.title: Power Naps Can Keep Your Brain from Shrinking: Study
entry.summary: UK Biobank data reveals daytime napping may be essential to improved reaction time and memory in middle-aged adults.

entry.title: Someone Recreated 'Diablo III' in NFT Game 'Nifty Island' Amid Airdrop Campaign
entry.summary: A passionate Diablo fan created an expansive game modeled after the popular franchise within Nifty Island, a buzzy new NFT game.

entry.title: WEN Airdrop Sparks Frenzy as Solana Meme Coin Targets a Million Wallets
entry.summary: Solana held steady during the WEN meme coin drop, although the chaos around the launch caused some wild price spikes.

entry.title: Bitcoin Will Crash—and Hard, Says This Crypto VC
entry.summary: The price of the biggest cryptocurrency could drop as low as $25,000, says ARK Invest’s ex-crypto lead.

entry.title: ‘Razzlekhan’: Amazon Is Turning $4 Billion Bitfinex Bitcoin Heist Into Feature Film
entry.summary: The film, directed by Hannah Marks, follows the life of the rapper-turned-crypto-thief and her husband, who pled guilty to the Bitcoin heist.

entry.title: Bitcoin Soars as Selling Slows—Is the Worst Over for Grayscale?
entry.summary: The markets are recovering after a major bearish run. Bitcoin and Ethereum have stopped the bleeding, leading a broader pump.

entry.title: How a Perfume DAO Brought its 'Scent of the Metaverse' to Luxury Store Harvey Nichols
entry.summary: Rook Perfumes formed a DAO to create a unique fragrance that conjures up the world of NFTs and the metaverse.

entry.title: How a Perfume DAO Crafted a 'Scent of the Metaverse'
entry.summary: Rook Perfumes founder Nadeem Crowe and Melissa Gilmour of Web3 creative agency Lily & Piper join Stephen Graves to talk about how they created a fragrance with a DAO and brought it to the shelves of London department store Harvey Nichols.

entry.title: Did Law Enforcement Crack Privacy Coin Monero? It's Complicated
entry.summary: If you're swapping Bitcoin for Monero frequently, it could "leak some information," says former MAGIC Monero Fund committee member Csilla Brimer.

entry.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Preview: Everything You Need to Know
entry.summary: UPDATED: How big?! A new report suggests that the Nintendo Switch 2 will pack a larger screen than any current Switch model.

entry.title: Bitcoin Pioneer Jeff Garzik Taps 'Star Trek' Icon to Direct 'Deathlands' TV Adaptation
entry.summary: A Linux and Bitcoin Core developer, Garzik wants to produce independent science fiction entertainment with Web3 tools.

entry.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Flat as Solana Meme Coin BONK Bounces 6.9%
entry.summary: Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana are flat after a rough start to the week. But Solana meme coin BONK has bounced almost 7% since yesterday.

entry.title: Ethereum’s Long-Awaited Upgrade Gets Closer As Devs Set Final Timeline
entry.summary: The next two updates should be completed in February, setting the stage for the final upgrade to go live.

entry.summary: Is IOTA the phoenix of crypto? As the second best performing token of the day, hardcore fans likely hope it is.

entry.title: How to Farm the Drift Protocol Airdrop on Solana
entry.summary: Drift Protocol, the largest perpetual swap futures exchange on Solana, just launched a points program ahead of an airdrop. Here's what you need to know.

entry.title: Microsoft Cuts 1,900 Xbox and Activision Staff Amid Gaming Industry Crisis
entry.summary: Nearly 6,000 game industry employees have lost their jobs already in 2024, with Microsoft now responsible for nearly one-third of the cuts.

entry.title: Rollups Are Coming to Bitcoin Through ‘Superlayer’ Protocol BitcoinOS
entry.summary: Backed by the DeFi project Sovryn, the framework is nearly trustless and has built-in anti-fraud features.

entry.title: Elon Musk's Tesla Still Holds $387 Million in Bitcoin
entry.summary: The company paper-handed its BTC during COVID-19, but then diamond handed the rest as it now focuses on AI and robotics.

entry.title: SEC Punts on Yet Another Spot Ethereum ETF
entry.summary: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has pushed back a decision on Grayscale's spot Ethereum ETF conversion proposal.

entry.title: US Will Sell $117 Million in Bitcoin Seized From Silk Road Drug Trafficker
entry.summary: The United States plans to sell a substantial stash of Bitcoin forfeited by a convicted Silk Road drug trafficker from Maryland.

entry.summary: The PIXEL token airdrop is nearly here—but until then, the Pixels team is keeping the buzz alive with giveaways and challenges.

entry.title: 'Britcoin' CBDC Not Ready Yet, Says Bank of England
entry.summary: British policy makers are still undecided on a digital pound—dubbed "Britcoin"—following a central bank digital currency (CBDC) consultation.

entry.summary: Another day, another airdrop. About half a million Ethereum wallets can claim the AltLayer (ALT) token now.

entry.title: Bitcoin Steadies on Strong GDP Report in U.S.
entry.summary: Bitcoin remained steady on news that the U.S. economy grew more than expected during Q4, even if it did slow down from the previous quarter.

entry.summary: The gamified Bitcoin DeFi accelerator aims to be a “viral utility token,” building a DeFi and gaming ecosystem on Bitcoin.

entry.summary: Jason Rohrer says the interactions with his AI model, based on a deceased person, were taken out of context in a new film screened at Sundance.

entry.title: Judge Blocks CZ Travel to UAE, Despite Offer to Use $4.5B Binance Equity as Security
entry.summary: The Binance founder had requested to travel to the UAE to be present for the “hospitalization and surgery” of an unnamed individual.

entry.summary: Nova Labs has teamed with Telefónica to deploy the wireless hotspots, which are incentivized with crypto tokens on Solana, in Mexico.

entry.summary: Bitcoin-related stocks like Coinbase and MicroStrategy are down as the price of the biggest cryptocurrency takes a heavy hit this month.

entry.summary: Gala Games supports content creators, but doesn't want them focused on token prices and ROI. Can "moonboy" talk pose a real legal threat?

entry.summary: Trump sold ETH last month, but he didn’t dump TRUMP. Now the Ethereum-based meme coin has skyrocketed in value.

entry.summary: The exCEO of Bitmex thinks that a series of wars and the need to finance them are among reasons to expect a steep crypto price correction before the next bull run.

entry.title: Trash-Fueled BTC Mining w/ Chris Bennet
entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Chris Bennet from Spacestation Investments.
They discuss: - Mining BTC with energy generated from landfills - How to increase deal-flow - Running an agency vs running a fund

entry.title: Preview of Agoria's 'Le Code d’Orsay'
entry.summary: A first look at "Sigma Lumina," a sculpture by artist and musician Agoria in collaboration with Johan Lescure. It features in "Le Code d’Orsay," the first NFT exhibition at the Musée d’Orsay.

entry.title: Are you the one being farmed? w/ Frisson
entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Frisson from Tallyx.xyz
They reflect on: - building in the bear market - the points system meta - will zoomers care about decentralization

entry.title: 'Look Touch Own': OONA Discusses Her Performance Art Exhibition
entry.summary: Conceptual artist OONA joins moderator Raina Marie to discuss "Look Touch Own," her performance art exhibition featuring her own former breast implants, which have been tokenized. This conversation was recorded at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel Miami in December 2023.

entry.title: Genius Marketing by Genius Marketers: How Crypto Builders Can Reach the Masses
entry.summary: Rug Radio founder Farokh Sarmad moderates a conversation between 9dcc founder and CEO Gmoney and Serotonin founder and CEO Amanda Cassatt about the challenges and opportunities in Web3 marketing and how they're navigating the ever-evolving space. Recorded at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel Miami in December 2023.

entry.title: Generative Art Across Mediums: Artists Discuss the Evolving Space
entry.summary: In this panel discussion from Rug Radio's R Haus at Art Basel Miami 2023, Sofia Garcia, Ismail Tazi, Emily Edelman, and Aleksandra Art discuss the expanding generative art space—and why "generative" doesn't necessarily have to mean digital.

entry.title: The AI Coin to Rule Them All with Mike Grantis
entry.summary: Reza is joined by Mike Grantis from Contango Digital to discuss - The AI coin to rule them all - The Solana Ecosystem - What's next for Solana airdrops

entry.title: Conversation With Snowfro: Bringing 'Chromie Squiggle' #8107 to the Physical Space
entry.summary: Art Blocks founder and CEO and "Chromie Squiggle" project creator Erick "snowfro" Calderon spoke with Benny Redbeard Gross at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel 2023, to discuss how and why "Chromie Squiggle" NFT #8107 was given a special edition print run in collaboration with Avant Arte.

entry.title: Don't Underestimate Mobile Gaming: Qualcomm's Matthew Grossman
entry.summary: Qualcomm product marketing manager Matthew Grossman tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin why mobile esports is exploding in popularity around the world—and dispels some of the misconceptions around mobile gaming.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF: This Is the 'Calm Before the Storm', Says ETF Analyst
entry.summary: Bloomberg Senior ETF Analyst Eric Balchunas joins Farokh Sarmad, Michael Anderson, and Ovie Faruq on the FOMO Hour to share the latest intel on the looming approval for a spot Bitcoin ETF, what might happen when the very different worlds of TradFi and crypto collide, and his insights on “Genslish,” the unique and strategic language of SEC chair Gary Gensler.

entry.title: Losing 1500 BTC on Mt Gox and the Problem with Women in Web3
entry.summary:
This week our host is joined by Brooke Lacey!
They discuss: - Making and losing generational wealth - Trauma Bond - Women in Web3 - The Problem with WAGMI

entry.title: ESL Faceit Group Exploring Blockchain 'Opportunistically,' Says Exec
entry.summary: Sam Braithwaite—ESL Faceit Group's VP of Game Ecosystems, Mobile, and Snapdragon Pro Series—shares the esports firm's approach to blockchain technology with GG's Kate Irwin.
